description: All you need is one ingredient to make these nutritionally approved mango straps. The kids will rejoice when they find this fruity snack in their lunch box.
name: Easy Mango Straps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 3 1/2 hours or until mango is dry to touch but still pliable. Cool for 5 minutes, then cut into strips and store in an airtight container until ready to serve.
